dublin_core.dcvalue: Shin, Y. (2018). The Effects of the Productive “Visible-Annotation Tool” (P-“VAT”) for Collaborative Knowledge Construction on Higher-Order Interaction and Collaborative Outcome . In Kay, J. and Luckin, R. (Eds.) Rethinking Learning in the Digital Age: Making the Learning Sciences Count, 13th International Conference of the Learning Sciences (ICLS) 2018, Volume 3. London, UK: International Society of the Learning Sciences.
International Society of the Learning Sciences, Inc. [ISLS].
The Effects of the Productive “Visible-Annotation Tool” (P-“VAT”) for Collaborative Knowledge Construction on Higher-Order Interaction and Collaborative Outcome
